text: avaru (janāṅgadavaru) avarannu (nūh‌rannu) suḷḷanendu tiraskarisidaru. Konege avarannu hāgū haḍaginalli avara jotegiddavarannu nāvu rakṣisidevu mattu avarannu bhūmiyalli pratinidhigaḷāgi māḍidevu. Innu, nam'ma vacanagaḷannu suḷḷendu tiraskarisidavarannu nāvu muḷugisibiṭṭevu. Nōḍiri, eccarisalpaṭṭavara gati ēnāyitendu
